item.title: Appointment
item.description: TASK 1 What does the acronym SQL stand for? Ans: Structured Query language TASK 2 What is one of the most common type of SQL vulnerabilities? Ans: SQL Injection TASK 3 What is the 2021 OWASP Top 10 classification for this vulnerability? searching on google will give us the answer ANS: A03:2021-Injection What does Nmap report as the service and version that are running on port 80 of the target?
